titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Los Angeles Football Club for winning the 2022 Major League Soccer Cup.
A resolution congratulating the Los Angeles Football Club for winning the 2022 Major League Soccer Cup.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution congratulates the Los Angeles Football Club and the club's fans on winning the 2022 Major League Soccer Cup.
